text: Titia Jisu pora taikhan ke koise, â€œTumikhan yate pora ja pichete, John ke jai kene tumikhan ki dikhise aru hunise etu kobi. Andha manu khan dikhi pai ase, lengra khan bera bole pari ase, korhi bemar thaka khan sapha hoi ase aru kaan benga khan huni ase, mora manu jinda hoi ase, aru gorib manu khan susamachar laga kotha huni bole pai ase.
